rules_text:
Whenever Coralcollage Ammonite attacks or blocks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
{1}, {T}: Coralcollage Ammonite explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
